comments.author: Werner
comments.body: Ah, Dave, I hate to tell you this, but you are wearing your jacket... :-)

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Tweak, fiddle, nudge, and ganoose... It seems that's all you people ever do here at the Frenzy! Would you please just leave the blasted thing alone so I can have _just one little thing_ left in my life that still works? Would it be too much to ask? Now how the hell do I get out of here and has anyone seen my jacket? DU
